knimeNode.name: PMML Simple Regression Tree Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies regression from a regression tree model stored in PMML format.

fullDescription.intro: Applies regression from a regression tree model by using the mean of the records in the corresponding child node.
fullDescription.option: Check this option if you want to change the name of the prediction column.
Name of the output column name. It contains the predicted value for each row.

ports.inPort: PMML containing a simple regression tree model.
